## StopArea.journeys() method

Get Journeys from the stop area

**Signature:**

```typescript
journeys(to?: string, date?: Date): Promise<Journey[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  to | string | _(Optional)_ The id or name of the destination |
|  date | Date | _(Optional)_ The date of the journey |
